trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a unit of data is read from or written to an address that is not a multiple of the data size.
trans-unit.target: 当在某个地址读取或写入一个单元的数据，但该地址的数据大小不是该数据单元的整数倍时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Some microprocessors, such as 64-bit processors, can issue hardware exceptions when data is read or written to a misaligned address (that is, when an address is not a multiple of the size of the data being accessed).
trans-unit.target: 读取或写入未对齐的地址数据时，某些微处理器，例如 64 位处理器，可以发出硬件异常 （即，当一个地址不是正在访问的数据的大小的倍数）。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DataMisalignedException> is typically thrown when 16-bit, 32-bit, or 64-bit data is read from or written to an address that is not a multiple of two, four, or eight bytes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DataMisalignedException> 通常从读取或写入不是两个、 4 或 8 个字节的倍数的地址 16 位、 32 位或 64 位数据时引发。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DataMisalignedException> exposes the underlying hardware exception, which allows you to respond in an appropriate manner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DataMisalignedException>公开基础硬件异常，这允许你以适当的方式进行响应。

trans-unit.source: For example, a routine in your application attempts to copy a sequence of bytes from one location to another in 64-bit units.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你的应用程序中的例程尝试将一个字节序列从一个位置复制到另一个以 64 位为单位。

trans-unit.source: However, the write operation starts at a misaligned address, which causes the common language runtime to throw a <xref:System.DataMisalignedException>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，写入操作开始未对齐的地址，这会导致公共语言运行时引发<xref:System.DataMisalignedException>。

trans-unit.source: Your routine responds to the exception by copying the data one byte at a time.
trans-unit.target: 您的例程，通过将一个字节的数据复制一次响应该异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DataMisalignedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.DataMisalignedException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DataMisalignedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.DataMisalignedException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The content of <c>message</c> is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 消息的内容被设计为人可理解的形式<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DataMisalignedException" /> class using the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.DataMisalignedException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The content of <c>message</c> is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 消息的内容被设计为人可理解的形式<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current <see cref="T:System.DataMisalignedException" />.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前 <see cref="T:System.DataMisalignedException" /> 的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DataMisalignedException" /> class using the specified error message and underlying exception.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误信息和基础异常初始化 <see cref="T:System.DataMisalignedException" /> 类的新实例。
